Der Unterhändler
人质谈判
boardgame.description: In Hostage Negotiator, you play the part of a law enforcement agent responsible for negotiating the release of hostages taken by an unscrupulous figure hell-bent on having his or her demands met._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn in the game represents a conversation between you and the hostage taker. You'll play cards and roll dice to increase conversation points, decrease the threat level, and release hostages. Hostage Negotiator uses a unique _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;hand-building_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; mechanism that puts cards you purchase directly in your hand for next turn rather than leaving you wondering when the cards will show up like in deck-building games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Hostage Negotiator there are multiple paths to victory, but the hostage taker has other plans. Will you try to calm him and get him to surrender? Will you stall and bide your time before sending in the team for a major extraction? How many hostages will you save? These are many of the exciting decisions you will make in a game of Hostage Negotiator!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

New in shrink. Direct bank transfer is the best way to pay. Check out my other games to bundle an order and save on postage. I usually get the package in the post the day after purchase. I must emphasise that I take extra care to package in a sturdy box with packing protection, however I accept no responsibility for the package once it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in the hands of Auspost. If you have a wild postal contractor who likes to hurl boxes AFL style at your front door then please let me know to organise signature on delivery. (Likewise if you live in a building where you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re not prepared to take the risk of Auspost leaving a parcel at the front door.) No refunds for damage or loss in transit - please take it up with Auspost - I will be happy to provide a copy of the receipt for your claim. All parcels come with a tracking number. If you require extra insurance then let me know and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll arrange it. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve sold hundreds of games using Auspost and only once had a problem with damage to a game. Local pickup in St Ives is available.

Kickstarter edition of Hostage Negotiator. Played once, in great condition. Includes: Base game, Abductor Packs 1, 2, 3, and 4, and the bonus negotiator cards. Buyer will pay cost to ship. Box is small. I would prefer to not ship out of the USA, but if you really want me to, we can talk.

Van Ryder Games (VRG003) In Hostage Negotiator you play the part of a law enforcement agent responsible for negotiating the release of hostages taken by an unscrupulous figure hell bent on having his or her demands met. Each turn in the game represents a conversation between you and the Hostage Taker. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll play cards and roll dice to increase Conversation points, decrease the Threat level, and release hostages. Hostage Negotiator uses a unique _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Hand-Building_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; mechanic that puts cards you purchase directly in your hand for next turn rather than leaving you wondering when the cards will show up like in deck building games. In Hostage Negotiator there are multiple paths to victory, but the Hostage taker has other plans. Will you try to calm him and get him to surrender? Will you stall and bide your time before sending in the team for a Major Extraction? How many hostages will you save? These are many of the exciting decisions you will make in a game of Hostage Negotiator!

Hostage Negotiator, from kickstarter. Just played solo a few times, never gone out anywhere, like new condition! Local boston area pickup, or USPS shipping, likely in a small flat rate box. Included abductor packs 1-4. Everything in base box. Everything looks good and 100% complete. $6 shipping anywhere in the U.S

Van Ryder Games (VRG003) In Hostage Negotiator you play the part of a law enforcement agent responsible for negotiating the release of hostages taken by an unscrupulous figure hell bent on having his or her demands met. Each turn in the game represents a conversation between you and the Hostage Taker. You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll play cards and roll dice to increase Conversation points, decrease the Threat level, and release hostages. Hostage Negotiator uses a unique _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Hand-Building_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; mechanic that puts cards you purchase directly in your hand for next turn rather than leaving you wondering when the cards will show up like in deck building games. In Hostage Negotiator there are multiple paths to victory, but the Hostage taker has other plans. Will you try to calm him and get him to surrender? Will you stall and bide your time before sending in the team for a Major Extraction? How many hostages will you save? These are many of the exciting decisions you will make in a game of Hostage Negotiator!
